article.title: Wolff Promoted, Assigned to J-5, Joint Staff
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Maj. Gen. Terry A. Wolff, USA, has been nominated for appointment to the rank of lieutenant general and assignment as director, strategic plans and policy, J-5, Joint Staff, and senior member, U.S. Delegation to the United Nations Military Staff Committee, Washington, D.C.
